name: Santa's Snowman
description:
Collect all the presents and put them by the tree in each of the game's 8 levels. This is a short holiday themed NES game I made using Retro Puzzle Maker. You can press the B button to undo your last move.

If you'd like to play the game on your NES emulator of choice, feel free to download the ROM file.

The graphics were made by myself and RefreshGames
The music is by Ted Kerr (Wolfgang) and congusbongus
